properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 2:09PM EST until January 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt expected.
Significant wave heights up to 6 feet.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 1 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY
